mapper.insert: insert into board (user_no, article_no, board_type, subject, content, createtime) values (#{userNo}, #{articleNo}, #{boardType}, #{subject}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.user_no, u.name, b.subject, b.content, b.createtime from board b join user u on b.user_no = u.user_no where b.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment (board_no, content, createtime, user_no) values (#{boardNo}, #{content}, now(), #{userNo})
insert into board_like (user_no, board_no, like_time) values (#{userNo}, #{boardNo}, now())
